channel.title: Pages on Lorenzo Peppoloni

item.title: About
item.description: About A brief history of my education and experience Education I got a BSc in Informatic Engineering and a MSc in Robotics and Automation from University of Pisa. After that I got a PhD in Perceptual Robotics from Scoula Superiore Sant’Anna. The main focus of my PhD was human motion reconstruction from cheap sensors applied to robotic teleoperation and robotic embodiement. In 2015 and later in 2017, I spent some time in LA at USC with Prof.
